module.name: Filestore
module.changelog: *15.0.2.4* FREEPBX-19655 Fix S3 naming conventions *15.0.2.3* Dont remove old filestores when upgrading *15.0.2.2* Fix ability to add S3 *15.0.2.1* FREEPBX-18248 *15.0.2* Update functionality *15.0.1.10* fixing legacy restore *15.0.1.9* FREEPBX-18729 Fix S3 action and general consistency *15.0.1.8* FREEPBX-18248 Fix delete parameter in edit forms *15.0.1.7* Fixing FREEPBX-18651 *15.0.1.6* FREEPBX-18652 Fix logic on region to match the actual setting *15.0.1.5* FREEPBX-18249 Fix s3 grid delete link *15.0.1.4* Formatting *15.0.1.3* FREEPBX-18244 Add the SFTP library back. *15.0.1.2* FREEPBX-18224 Fix local add button *15.0.1* Stable Release *15.0.1alpha1* Initial release
